overview.heading: Melbourne Virtual Office
overview.body: Lock in an outstanding business address in Melbourne without the expense of a traditional office space. With Opus VO, you can anchor your business in Melbourne’s dynamic environment, and you won’t have to empty your pockets to do it. When high-level meetings or client consultations are on the agenda, you’ve got access to our state-of-the-art conference rooms.  Joining the Opus VO virtual platform in Melbourne also scores you a live receptionist, who will become an extension of your brand, primed to provide personalized and top-notch customer service. Hand over routine tasks like call-handling and mail management to us, so you can focus on steering your business toward success.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Melbourne, Florida even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Melbourne. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Florida.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Melbourne virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Melbourne?
sections.body: Melbourne is more than a beautiful destination; it’s a thriving business hub. With booming industries from tech to healthcare, our Melbourne location sets you up for seamless connections to key players and relevant networking events.  By choosing an Opus Virtual Office in Melbourne, you’re not just saving money—you’re capturing an edge over your competitors. Want to soar to new heights? Our unparalleled virtual office services are just a call away.  Choose from two of the Opus VO Melbourne locations @ 575 S Wickham Road, Melbourne, FL 32904, or 4100 North Wickham Rd., Melbourne, FL 32935

seo.meta_description: Get the ultimate office solution for your business with our Florida, Melbourne virtual office located at 575 S Wickham Road. Grow your business now!
